mapper.select: select count(1) from DoctorList where shid=0
mapper.insert: insert into doctorlist (did, name,photo,sex,age,liuprice, tijiaotime,shid,tel, idcard,zigecard,zhixingcard, zigepicture,zhixingpicture,idcardpicture,gongzuopicture) values (seq_Doctor.nextval, #{name},#{photo},#{sex},#{age},#{liuprice}, sysdate,#{shid},#{tel}, #{idcard},#{zigecard},#{zhixingcard}, #{zigepicture},#{zhixingpicture},#{idcardpicture},#{gongzuopicture})
mapper.select: select did, name,photo,sex,age,liuprice,shid,tel, idcard,zigecard,zhixingcard, zigepicture,zhixingpicture,idcardpicture,gongzuopicture from doctorlist where did=#{did}
mapper.update: update doctorlist set name=#{name},photo=#{photo}, sex=#{sex},age=#{age},liuprice=#{liuprice},shid=#{shid}, tel=#{tel},idcard=#{idcard},zigecard=#{zigecard},zhixingcard=#{zhixingcard}, zigepicture=#{zigepicture},zhixingpicture=#{zhixingpicture}, idcardpicture=#{idcardpicture},gongzuopicture=#{gongzuopicture} where did=#{did}
mapper.select: select * from (select did,name,photo,de.dname,s.special,z.state,i.position,searchlable,tjtime,rownum rownum_ from DoctorList d left join specialty s on s.sid = d.sid left join department de on de.id = d.deptid left join zhuangtai z on z.zid = d.zid left join identify i on i.iid = d.iid where rownum <=#{page}*#{rows} and d.shid=1) where rownum_ >(#{page}-1)*#{rows}
select count(1) from DoctorList where shid=1

select did,name,de.dname,s.special,z.state,i.position,searchlable,tjtime,rownum rownum_ from DoctorList d left join specialty s on s.sid = d.sid left join department de on de.id = d.deptid left join zhuangtai z on z.zid = d.zid left join identify i on i.iid = d.iid where d.shid=1
